overview: Duncan joined Netbiscuits in 2010 and oversees the company’s global sales, partner and services operations. Duncan is an experienced sales leader and expert on the business aspects of successful mobile channel strategies. Before joining Netbiscuits he was charged with developing international mobile business strategy at Skype and has held a number of senior sales, marketing and consultant roles over the past decade at pioneering mobile and internet communications companies including Pitch Entertainment Group, mBlox, Netsize and Mobile Streams. Duncan received a B.A. in Events Management at Leeds Met University.
